ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Selecting linear and generalized linear models for large data sets using modified stepwise procedure and modern selection criteria (like modifications of Bayesian Information Criterion). Selection can be performed on data which exceed RAM capacity.

Selecting linear and generalized linear models for large data sets using modified stepwise procedure and modern selection criteria (like modifications of Bayesian Information Criterion). Selection can be performed on data which exceed RAM capacity.

name: r-bigstep
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.2" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bigstep
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/bigstep_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/bigstep/bigstep_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b0f61ca86b49399a87db363ead448d34bbcf34356500bf0cbf3874ba25e214d8

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r.utils
    - r-rcppeigen
    - r-bigmemory
    - r-magrittr
    - r-matrixstats
    - r-speedglm
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r.utils
    - r-rcppeigen
    - r-bigmemory
    - r-magrittr
    - r-matrixstats
    - r-speedglm

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('bigstep')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('bigstep')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://github.com/pmszulc/bigstep
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Selecting linear and generalized linear models for large data sets using modified stepwise procedure and modern selection criteria (like modifications of Bayesian Information Criterion). Selection can be performed on data which exceed RAM capacity.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: bigstep
# Type: Package
# Title: Stepwise Selection for Large Data Sets
# Version: 1.0.3
# Date: 2019-7-17
# Authors@R: person("Piotr", "Szulc", email = "piotr.michal.szulc@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"))
# Description: Selecting linear and generalized linear models for large data sets using modified stepwise procedure and modern selection criteria (like modifications of Bayesian Information Criterion). Selection can be performed on data which exceed RAM capacity.
# License: GPL-3
# URL: http://github.com/pmszulc/bigstep
# BugReports: http://github.com/pmszulc/bigstep/issues
# Depends: R (>= 3.5.0)
# Imports: bigmemory, magrittr, matrixStats, R.utils, RcppEigen, speedglm, stats, utils
# Suggests: devtools, knitr, rmarkdown, testthat
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 6.1.1
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-07-23 07:15:30 UTC; user
# Author: Piotr Szulc [aut, cre]
# Maintainer: Piotr Szulc <piotr.michal.szulc@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-07-25 23:10:02 UTC
